citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 on
12/09/2015. All phone numbers provided to the inspector were either wrong number or disconnected. The
inspector waited on premises 30 minutes before leaving a business card requesting contact to schedule an
inspection of the licensees' new site.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 on
12/09/2015.  All phone numbers provided to the inspector were either wrong number or disconnected.  The
inspector waited on premises 30 minutes before leaving a business card requesting contact to schedule an
inspection of the licensees' new site.
